name: Fox on the Run!
text:
Salads
Fox Turkey Club Salad $14.00
Turkey, cheddar cheese, avocado & bacon
Roasted Turkey Salad $12.00
Turkey, sausage & sage dressing, cranberries
Grilled Vegetable Salad $12.00
Grilled vegetables, red onions & Feta cheese
Garden Salad $9.00
Shredded carrot, diced cucumbers, red onions & tomatoes
Fox Greek Salad $12.00
Red onion, cucumbers, Feta cheese & black olives
Salmon Salad $12.00
Smoked salmon, capers, cucumbers & red onion
Roasted Chicken Salad $14.00
Roasted chicken, dilled Gouda cheese & diced avocados
All salads start with spring mix, tomatoes, cucumbers, and carrots.
Your choice of sundried tomato, Greek, homemade honey dill, homemade ranch, or balsamic dressing.
Soups & Combos
Small Bowl $5.00
Add to any sandwich or salad $3.00
Medium Bowl $6.00
Add to any sandwich or salad $4.00
Large Bowl $7.00
Served with a piece of bread (eat-in only)
Add to any sandwich or salad $5.00
Sandwich Combos
Add a Garden Salad to Any Sandwich $2.50
Sharing Combo $15.00
Any sandwich & 2 cups of soup
Sandwiches & Wraps
Thunder Bay Stacker $12.50
Shaved roasted beef, roasted turkey, smoked ham, in-house made Stacker
sauce, lettuce, tomato, onions & Swiss cheese on our 12-grain loaf
Homestyle Meatloaf Sandwich $11.50
Roasted garlic mayo, bacon & caramelized onion jam on our 12-grain loaf
Pulled Pork Grilled Cheese $12.50
Slow roasted pulled pork in our homemade BBQ sauce, topped
with caramelized onions and cheddar cheese on marble rye
Grilled Vegetable Pesto Melt $10.50
Grilled vegetables, pesto mayo, Parmesan & Thunder Oak Gouda
Oven Roasted Turkey Sandwich $11.50
Oven-roasted turkey on our cranberry loaf with a sweet potato mayo,
lettuce, tomato, sausage & sage stuffing
Roasted Chicken Wrap $12.00
Roasted chicken, dilled Gouda cheese, pesto & garlic mayo, lettuce,
tomato & avocados
Chicken Pesto Melt $12.00
Roasted chicken, pesto & garlic mayo, roasted red peppers, red onion &
Thunder Oak Gouda
Smoked Salmon Wrap $11.00
Smoked salmon, lettuce, diced tomatoes, caper cream cheese, honey
dill, cucumbers & red onion
Ham, Swiss & Mushroom Melt $12.00
Ham, bacon, grain mustard, garlic mayo, tomato, Swiss cheese
Egg Salad on Marble Rye $10.00
Classic sandwich with our unique twist on thickly sliced marble rye &
lettuce
Turkey Club Wrap $11.50
Roasted turkey breast, bacon, cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato &
housemade ranch & honey dill in a flour tortilla
Build Your Own Sandwich
Choose your meat $12.00 | Veggie $11.00
Add $3.50 for any sandwich made with a gluten-free option.
Looking for something special?
Ask how we can help you create your own meal!
